articles.title: Epic and Google agree to settle their lawsuit and change Android’s fate globally
articles.description: Just when we thought Epic v. Google might be over, just one Supreme Court rejection away from a complete victory for Epic, both sides have agreed to settle Tuesday evening. And if Judge James Donato, who ordered Google to crack open Android for third-party stores, agrees to the changes, it might turn Epic’s victory into […]
articles.author: Sean Hollister

articles.title: The best robot vacuums we've tested for 2025
articles.description: Robot vacuums are impressive devices that will clean your floors well and — thanks to bigger batteries and better robot brains — rarely get tired of doing their job. Over the last few years, they have gone from being utilitarian devices that sweep your floor to full-fledged home robots that can vacuum and mop your […]
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
